fields.name: duplicate_error_text
fields.fieldText: Identical price request for season {!Select_Season} already exists and contains prices. Please check the {!varSelectedCarrier.Name} account, or add additional mandatory lanes to the current price request

fields.name: end_text
fields.fieldText: Your price request has been successfully submittedï»¿

fields.name: no_products_text
fields.fieldText:
You selected the following delivery locations: {!varDeliveryCodes}.


However, {!varSelectedCarrier.Name} only supports delivery to the following locations: {!varSelectedCarrier.Destination_Country_Codes__c}.


Please select delivery locations that are valid for the current carrier

value.stringValue: Price Request Will Be Send To

fields.fieldText:
Select Additional Prices

If you want to request additional price information from a carrier, select the checkboxes

fields.name: carriers_header
fields.fieldText: Select Season and Carrier

textTemplates.name: tt_emailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hello,
We hope this message finds you well.
A new price request has been created and requires your input. Please review the request and submit your freight prices at your earliest convenience.
You can access the submission form using the link below: {!f_PortalUrl}
If you have any questions or experience any issues accessing the portal, please donât hesitate to contact us.
Thank you for your prompt attention to this request.
Best regards, The ECL Team

textTemplates.name: tt_emailBody_portalCode
textTemplates.text:
Thank you for being a valued customer!
Here is your access code to log in to our customer portal: Access Code: {!varSelectedCarrier.Access_code__c}
If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out to our support team.
Best regards, The ECL Team
